input.sentences: they marched in unison at the parade .
dancers lept towards the crowds along the parade route .
the bagpipe players wore their traditional kilts .

output.sentences: The men marched in unison in the parade.
The man in the colorful costume lept through the parade.
The men who wore the traditional kilts were bagpipe players.
Everyone enjoyed the sad sound of the bagpipes.
The clock tower stood tall with a flag representing the nation.
